title: [Town Well]
description: An old wooden bench rests in the shade next to the well, nearly covered by a low-hanging oak branch.  A few townspeople and merchants relax and chat in the cool, shaded air, taking a break in their errands or simply wasting time.

An old wooden bench rests in the shade next to the well, nearly covered by a low-hanging oak branch.  A few townspeople and merchants relax and chat in the cool night air, taking a break in their errands or simply wasting time.
